wikipedia_page.main: Cuthbert Edward Higgins (born 26 January 1945) is a Scottish former amateur football outside left who played in the Scottish League for Queen's Park. He was capped by Scotland at amateur level.

response: Higgins was born in Tarpon Springs, Florida, United States, and is of Portuguese, Irish and German descent. He once supported himself as a sponge diver, and began his career in show business at the age of twelve as a ventriloquist. He won prizes in local talent contests and became a favorite at school assemblies around Tampa Bay, Florida. Higgins has stated that he is related to German poet, Johann Wolfgang von Goethe."Bertie Higgins", Orlando Sentinel. November 9, 1986. Retrieved February 11, 2020.
Jazz vocalist Nancy Wilson recorded a version of the Bertie Higgins original song "Casablanca" for EMI Records.
